${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:QuickRun.NAME: Quick Run
${modID}:QuickRun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this causes the enemy to lose HP you gain [E].

${modID}:QuickRun2.NAME: Quick Run 2.0
${modID}:QuickRun2.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you've played 3 cards this turn gain [E] [E].

${modID}:Pilfer.NAME: Pilfer
${modID}:Pilfer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If fatal, gain !M! Gold.

${modID}:Bankroll.NAME: Bankroll
${modID}:Bankroll.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to 1/!M!th of your total gold.

${modID}:Investments.NAME: Investments
${modID}:Investments.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your next X turns, add an Investment into your hand.
${modID}:Investments.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your next X turns, add an Investment into your hand NL Retain

${modID}:Interest.NAME: Interest
${modID}:Interest.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! gold NL Ethereal NL Exhaust

${modID}:Stockpile.NAME: Stockpile
${modID}:Stockpile.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! gold. NL Ethereal NL Exhaust.

${modID}:EMP.NAME: EMP
${modID}:EMP.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Steal ALL Block from ALL enemies.

${modID}:AdaptiveShields.NAME: Adaptive Shields
${modID}:AdaptiveShields.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, if the enemy intends to attack apply !M! Weak.

${modID}:AdaptiveStrike.NAME: Adaptive Strike
${modID}:AdaptiveStrike.DESCRIPTION: If the target does not intend to attack, apply !M! vulnerable NL deal !D! damage

${modID}:SelfRepairScripts.NAME: Self Repair Scripts
${modID}:SelfRepairScripts.DESCRIPTION: RunnerMod:repair !M! at the start of each turn.

${modID}:RigReboot.NAME: Rig Reboot
${modID}:RigReboot.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL your debuffs. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:RigReboot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL your debuffs. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust. NL Retain.

${modID}:Improvise.NAME: Improvise
${modID}:Improvise.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Draw 3. NL Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Improvise.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Draw 3. NL Gain [E] [E]. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:DDOS.NAME: DDOS
${modID}:DDOS.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies, any enemy that loses health this way gains !M! vulnerable.

${modID}:Withdrawal.NAME: Withdrawal
${modID}:Withdrawal.DESCRIPTION: Add a Bankroll to your discard pile. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Withdrawal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an Upgraded Bankroll to your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Virus.NAME: Virus
${modID}:Virus.DESCRIPTION: When drawn discard a card at random. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:FaultyUpgrade.NAME: Faulty Upgrade
${modID}:FaultyUpgrade.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Add 2 *Viruses to your discard pile.

${modID}:GlitchedBlade.NAME: Glitched Blade
${modID}:GlitchedBlade.DESCRIPTION: Add a virus to your discard pile. NL Deal !D! damage time the number of *Viruses created this floor.

${modID}:MalwareScan.NAME: Malware Scan
${modID}:MalwareScan.DESCRIPTION: Remove !M! random status from your deck. NL Draw a card. NL RunnerMod:Neon.
${modID}:MalwareScan.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove !M! random statuses from your deck. NL Draw a card. NL RunnerMod:Neon.

${modID}:Upgrades.NAME: Upgrades
${modID}:Upgrades.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn upgrade a random card in your hand.
${modID}:Upgrades.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn upgrade !M! cards in your hand.

${modID}:HeadOn.NAME: Head On
${modID}:HeadOn.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block !M! times. NL Increases with Damage instead of Block.

${modID}:Flourish.NAME: Flourish
${modID}:Flourish.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you gain block this turn deal !M! damage to that enemy.

${modID}:WallOfStatic.NAME: Wall of Static
${modID}:WallOfStatic.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy gain !M! block.

${modID}:TimeIsMoney.NAME: Time is Money
${modID}:TimeIsMoney.DESCRIPTION: Spend !M! gold. NL Take an extra turn after this one.

${modID}:BladesStanceSwitch.NAME: Equip Blades
${modID}:BladesStanceSwitch.DESCRIPTION: RunnerMod:Equip  RunnerMod:Blades. NL Deal !D! damage. NL RunnerMod:Neon.

${modID}:WallStanceSwitch.NAME: Equip Shields
${modID}:WallStanceSwitch.DESCRIPTION: RunnerMod:Equip  RunnerMod:Shields. NL Gain !B! Block. NL RunnerMod:Neon.

${modID}:ArtifactStanceSwitch.NAME: Equip Firewall
${modID}:ArtifactStanceSwitch.DESCRIPTION: RunnerMod:Equip  RunnerMod:Firewall. NL Add a *Bolt to your hand. NL RunnerMod:Neon.

${modID}:OverclockStanceSwitch.NAME: Equip Overclocker
${modID}:OverclockStanceSwitch.DESCRIPTION: RunnerMod:Equip  RunnerMod:Overclocker. NL Draw !M! card. NL RunnerMod:Neon.
${modID}:OverclockStanceSwitch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: RunnerMod:Equip  RunnerMod:Overclocker. NL Draw !M! cards. NL RunnerMod:Neon.

${modID}:Durable.NAME: Durable
${modID}:Durable.DESCRIPTION: Equipment you equip has 2 more durability.

${modID}:EndOfTheLine.NAME: End of The Line
${modID}:EndOfTheLine.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Die next turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:InsuranceScam.NAME: Insurance Scam
${modID}:InsuranceScam.DESCRIPTION: Take !D! damage. Gain !M! times that much gold.

${modID}:FinancialSmokescreen.NAME: Finanical Smokescreen
${modID}:FinancialSmokescreen.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! gold. NL Escape the combat.

${modID}:Bolt.NAME: Bolt
${modID}:Bolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply a random debuff. NL RunnerMod:Neon. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BladeDraw.NAME: Blade Draw
${modID}:BladeDraw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Strength until the end of this turn. NL RunnerMod:Equip  RunnerMod:Blades. NL RunnerMod:Neon.

${modID}:Flouresce.NAME: Fluoresce
${modID}:Flouresce.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! strength this turn. NL RunnerMod:Neon. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:InfectedBlade.NAME: Infected Blade
${modID}:InfectedBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and Apply !M! RunnerMod:Hacked X times. NL RunnerMod:Equip RunnerMod:Blades. NL RunnerMod:Neon.

${modID}:HardLightTech.NAME: Hard Light Tech
${modID}:HardLightTech.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage to a random enemy when you play a RunnerMod:Neon card.

${modID}:BrokenBlades.NAME: Broken Blades
${modID}:BrokenBlades.DESCRIPTION: RunnerMod:Equip RunnerMod:Blades. !M! NL Ethereal. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BrokenShields.NAME: Broken Shields
${modID}:BrokenShields.DESCRIPTION: RunnerMod:Equip RunnerMod:Shields !M! NL Ethereal NL Exhaust

${modID}:BrokenFirewall.NAME: Broken Firewall
${modID}:BrokenFirewall.DESCRIPTION: RunnerMod:Equip RunnerMod:Firewall !M! NL Ethereal NL Exhaust

${modID}:BrokenOverclocker.NAME: Broken Overclocker
${modID}:BrokenOverclocker.DESCRIPTION: RunnerMod:Equip RunnerMod:Overclocker !M! NL Ethereal NL Exhaust

${modID}:BrokenBlaster.NAME: Broken Blaster
${modID}:BrokenBlaster.DESCRIPTION: RunnerMod:Equip RunnerMod:Blaster !M! NL Ethereal NL Exhaust

${modID}:PawnShop.NAME: Pawn Shop
${modID}:PawnShop.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn add a random broken equipment to your hand NL Ethereal
${modID}:PawnShop.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn add a random broken equipment to your hand

${modID}:NanoFilamentBlade.NAME: Nano Filament Blade
${modID}:NanoFilamentBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL can be upgraded any number of times.

${modID}:MultiLayerShield.NAME: Multi Layer Shield
${modID}:MultiLayerShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

${modID}:Adapt.NAME: Adapt
${modID}:Adapt.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !RunnerMod:DEX! Dexterity. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

${modID}:Deplete.NAME: Deplete
${modID}:Deplete.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Gain 1 less [E] next turn.
${modID}:Deplete.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Gain 1 less [E] next turn. NL RunnerMod:Neon.

${modID}:BotNet.NAME: Bot Net
${modID}:BotNet.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn apply !M! random debuff to a random enemy.
${modID}:BotNet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn apply !M! random debuffs to random enemies.

${modID}:MalwareStorm.NAME: Malware Storm
${modID}:MalwareStorm.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! random debuffs to random enemies.

${modID}:ThoughtlessIncursion.NAME: Thoughtless Incursion
${modID}:ThoughtlessIncursion.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! random debuffs. NL Obtain 2 random debuffs.
${modID}:ThoughtlessIncursion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! random debuffs. NL Obtain 2 random debuffs.

${modID}:Digitise.NAME: Digitise
${modID}:Digitise.DESCRIPTION: Apply RunnerMod:Neon to !M! cards in your hand. NL Runnermod:Neon. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Infect.NAME: Infect
${modID}:Infect.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and Apply !M! RunnerMod:Hacked for each enemy in combat.

${modID}:BladeStorm.NAME: Bladestorm
${modID}:BladeStorm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times to ALL enemies. Runnermod:Neon.

${modID}:Stalemate.NAME: Stalemate
${modID}:Stalemate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. The enemy gains 5 block.

${modID}:Manifest.NAME: Manifest
${modID}:Manifest.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Chose 2 cards to retain this turn. NL Add a *virus to your discard pile.

${modID}:SwiftRun.NAME: Swift Run
${modID}:SwiftRun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this causes the enemy to lose HP, draw a card for each Run card played this turn.

${modID}:Overtax.NAME: Overtax
${modID}:Overtax.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity. NL At the start of each turn gain [E].

${modID}:SystemCrash.NAME: System Crash
${modID}:SystemCrash.DESCRIPTION: Deal 6 damage times the number of debuffs applied to the enemy.

${modID}:ScrapArmour.NAME: Scrap Armour
${modID}:ScrapArmour.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain durability, gain !M! Block.
${modID}:ScrapArmour.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain durability, gain !M! Block. NL Innate.

${modID}:Quarantine.NAME: Quarantine
${modID}:Quarantine.DESCRIPTION: All enemies lose !M! Strength for 1 turn. NL RunnerMod:Equip RunnerMod:Firewall. NL RunnerMod:Neon.

${modID}:Cloaking.NAME: Cloaking
${modID}:Cloaking.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you attack this enemy, gain !M! Block. NL RunnerMod:Equip RunnerMod:shields. NL RunnerMod:Neon. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:FreeRun.NAME: Free Run
${modID}:FreeRun.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Draw !M! card. NL Ethereal.
${modID}:FreeRun.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Ethereal.

${modID}:LaughingMan.NAME: Memetic Form
${modID}:LaughingMan.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn apply !M! RunnerMod:Hacked to ALL enemies. NL Ethereal.
${modID}:LaughingMan.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn apply !M! RunnerMod:Hacked to ALL enemies.

${modID}:EvasiveManoeuvres.NAME: Evasive Manoeuvres
${modID}:EvasiveManoeuvres.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you take damage this turn Gain 3 Block.

${modID}:Siphon.NAME: Siphon
${modID}:Siphon.DESCRIPTION: The enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Exhaust. NL Runnermod:Neon.

${modID}:Spam.NAME: Spam
${modID}:Spam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Draw !M! card and it costs 0 this turn.
${modID}:Spam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Draw !M! card and they cost 0 this turn.

${modID}:Decoy.NAME: Decoy
${modID}:Decoy.DESCRIPTION: RunnerMod:Neon. NL Does Nothing. NL Ethereal. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Decoy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: RunnerMod:Neon. NL Does Nothing with Intent. NL Ethereal. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:LostInTheCrowd.NAME: Lost in the Crowd
${modID}:LostInTheCrowd.DESCRIPTION: Fill your hand with *decoys. NL Ethereal.
${modID}:LostInTheCrowd.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fill your hand with upgraded *decoys. NL RunnerMod:Neon.

${modID}:GhostInTheShell.NAME: Ghost in the Shell
${modID}:GhostInTheShell.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! *Decoys to your hand.

${modID}:DoubleTime.NAME: Double Time
${modID}:DoubleTime.DESCRIPTION: RunnerMod:Equip  RunnerMod:Overclocker. NL Add !M! *Decoys to your hand. NL RunnerMod:Neon.
${modID}:DoubleTime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: RunnerMod:Equip  RunnerMod:Overclocker. NL Add !M! *Decoys to your hand. NL RunnerMod:Neon.

${modID}:ShortCircuit.NAME: Short Circuit
${modID}:ShortCircuit.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn Exhaust a card in your hand and gain [E].

${modID}:Cryostasis.NAME: Cryostasis
${modID}:Cryostasis.DESCRIPTION: Block is not removed at the start of your next turn. NL Retain your hand. NL End your turn.
${modID}:Cryostasis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Block is not removed at the start of your next turn. NL Retain your hand. NL End your turn. NL Runnermod:Neon.

${modID}:Escape.NAME: Escape!
${modID}:Escape.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Costs 1 less [E] for each card played this turn.

${modID}:CTRLV.NAME: CTRL-V
${modID}:CTRLV.DESCRIPTION: Make a copy of a card in your hand it costs 0 this turn.
${modID}:CTRLV.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Make a copy of a card in your hand it costs 0 this turn. NL Retain.

${modID}:Godspeed.NAME: Godspeed
${modID}:Godspeed.DESCRIPTION: Each time you take damage gain 3 block.

${modID}:Apex.NAME: Apex
${modID}:Apex.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Vigor. NL End your turn.

${modID}:CheapShot.NAME: Cheap Shot
${modID}:CheapShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL RunnerMod:Neon.

${modID}:Biohazard.NAME: Biohazard
${modID}:Biohazard.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! random debuffs to random enemies. NL Gain 5 Poison.

${modID}:TheWeaknessOfFlesh.NAME: The Weakness of Flesh
${modID}:TheWeaknessOfFlesh.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! plated armour. NL lose 5 Dexterity.

${modID}:Autopilot.NAME: Autopilot
${modID}:Autopilot.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn play the top !M! cards of your deck.

${modID}:WallOfForce.NAME: Wall of Force
${modID}:WallOfForce.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL You don't lose block for 5 turns. NL You can't gain block for 5 turns.

${modID}:Polyphony.NAME: Polyphony
${modID}:Polyphony.DESCRIPTION: Deal 4 damage times the number of cards played this combat to all enemies.

${modID}:Momentum.NAME: Momentum
${modID}:Momentum.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Apply !M! RunnerMod:Overwhelm.

${modID}:ScrapRun.NAME: Scrap Run
${modID}:ScrapRun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Add !M! card from your discard pile to your hand.
${modID}:ScrapRun.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Add !M! cards from your discard pile to your hand.

${modID}:ScoutingRun.NAME: Scouting Run
${modID}:ScoutingRun.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Put 2 cards from your hand to the bottom of your deck.

${modID}:StealthStrike.NAME: Stealth Strike
${modID}:StealthStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Gain !M! Vigor. NL Doesn't Consume Vigor.

${modID}:Recouperate.NAME: Recuperate
${modID}:Recouperate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block X times. NL Gain X [E] next turn.

${modID}:DrainingRun.NAME: Draining Run
${modID}:DrainingRun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Gain Block equal to the health lost.

${modID}:Overcome.NAME: Overcome
${modID}:Overcome.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Permanently increase this card's damage by !M!. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Thievery.NAME: Thievery
${modID}:Thievery.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Chose 1 of !M! cards of any colour and play it. NL It Exhausts.

${modID}:Akira.NAME: AKIRA
${modID}:Akira.DESCRIPTION: Replace part of your deck with unstable cards. NL You can no longer use equipment.
${modID}:Akira.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Try to ascend. NL Innate. NL (Replace part of your deck with unstable cards NL You can no longer use equipment.)
